Author: Andersen#8337
Content: https://tenor.com/view/conspiracy-theory-gif-10587157

Author: Andersen#8337
Content: GRIN

Author: liqdmetal#8650
Content: any network with enough sniffers on it is compromised, be it TOR or grin

Author: liqdmetal#8650
Content: de-anonymized

Author: liqdmetal#8650
Content: the network itself is critical to true anonymity

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: you miss my point. GRIN transactions are effectively encrypted in the blockchain form, but all the miners get plaintext transaction details. granted, still some work is needed to correlate things, but without any encryption layer, it is all in plaintext.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: compare that to the zcash transactions (that are not taddr), the entire transaction is encrypted, before it gets to the miner. so add all the sniffers you want, without the privkey, you wont be able to decrypt the zcash z-transaction

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: in this case, the network is not so critical and that is the big advantage of z transactions. also with PIRATE, the user cant make a transparent transaction, which is how most of the privacy is lost. by preventing the users from doing transparent tx, the highest level of privacy is maintained

Author: liqdmetal#8650
Content: i dont believe i did. the miners of grin only receive the aggregated transaction details with no addresses. therefore enough nodes needs to be sniffer nodes to de-anonymize anything

Author: liqdmetal#8650
Content: assuming a good number of transactions

Author: liqdmetal#8650
Content: no system is perfect as far as anonymity goes

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: ok, what does it cost to run a sniffer node? or 1000?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: please tell me how you will deanonymize zcash transactions, if all you have are z -> z transactions

Author: liqdmetal#8650
Content: ive acknowledged it is a weakness, im not pushing an agenda here

Author: liqdmetal#8650
Content: zksnarks are obviously not as scalable. you are mighty defensive though

Author: liqdmetal#8650
Content: you know and the trusted setup

Author: liqdmetal#8650
Content: pros and cons to all approaches
